name: Knitted Cheeky Monkey with long arms
description:
Sourced through Fair Trade in Peru, these cheeky monkeys will fast become your child's favourite! 

Knitted from 100% cotton with natural dyes and measuring approx 40cm (arms approx 30cm), the monkey lovingly hugs around little shoulders or neck providing comfort and friendship wherever they go.

Bubba Boutique sources a beautiful range of toys, decorations and educational resources that give children the opportunity to experience different material properties and textures to engage their senses and help them discover new abilities.  

Each toy has been individually handcrafted from natural fabrics such as silk, cotton and hessian.

___________________________________

Please note that while Bubba Boutique does its best to represent products exactly as they are, most products are hand made by different artisans, therefore each product is individual.

name: Animal Backpacks
description:
Fun frilled neck lizard and cute kangaroo backpack!

You bubba will love grabbing their special Australian-themed backpack -  whether it's to carry their lunchbox and library books or favourite toys and gadgets.

Sourced through Fair Trade in Sri Lanka and made from heavy, durable, hand woven and hand dyed cotton. 

27cm W (bottom) x 27cm H (when not gathered) 

Features front zip pocket approx 18cm, adjustable back straps, drawstring for easy closing and front clip for extra security.

name: Colourful Silk Balls with Bell
description:
Sourced through Fair Trade in Cambodia.

Beautiful hand made silk balls with hexagonal patches and embroidered circle design in the centre.

Each ball has a bell rattle that makes a lovely sound when rolled around. Perfect as a gift for children aged 0 - 3. Measures approx 13x13cm. 

ALSO AVAILABLE WITH ALPHABET LETTERS

Bubba Boutique’s beautiful range of balls offer children the opportunity to experience different material properties and textures. Each ball has been individually handcrafted from natural fabrics including silk & cotton.

The bright colours of our balls are visually stimulating - the contrasting patterns & colours will attract your child’s gaze, developing focus & strengthening eye muscles while the size & weight assists their motor skills, in particular grip and release.
 
Bubba Boutique is proud to offer your child educational play things made from natural, tactile materials that engage their senses and help them discover new abilities.

Please note that while Bubba Boutique does its best to represent products exactly as they are, most products are hand made by different artisans, therefore each product is individual. name: Arpillera - Peru Market Scene
description:
COMING SOON! Register your interest by contacting us.

Stunning arpillera from Peru, sourced through Fair Trade.

Incredible detail depicting daily life at the market in Peru. 

Measuring 1m x 1m this is truly a feature for any room, or use as a backdrop for display with traditional Peruvian dolls and animals (eg. Llamas).

This arpillera can be used to discuss culture, daily activites and traditional life in Peru. An excellent piece to develop language skills. Beautifully hand made, this arpillera can be explored through touch due to the different materials, fabrics and textures.


Bubba Boutique sources a beautiful range of toys, decorations and educational resources that give children the opportunity to experience different material properties and textures to engage their senses and help them discover new abilities.

name: Arpillera - Jungle Scene
description:
COMING SOON! 

Stunning arpillera from Peru, sourced through Fair Trade.

Incredible detail depicting life in the Peruvian Amazon featuring the river. 

An excellent piece to develop language skills. This arpillera can be used to discuss culture, daily activites and traditional life in the Peruvian Amazon Jungle. 

Beautifully hand made, this arpillera can be explored through touch due to the different materials, fabrics and textures.

Measuring 1m x 1m this is truly a feature for any room, or use as a backdrop for display with other jungle animals (eg. Bubba Boutique's jungle finger puppets).

"The Peruvian Amazon is the area of the Amazon jungle included in the territory of Peru, from the east of the Andes to borders with Ecuador, Colombia, Brazil and Bolivia. This region comprises 60% of the country and is marked by a large degree of biodiversity. Peru has the second largest portion of the Amazon rain forest after the Brazilian Amazon.

The Peruvian Amazon jungle is one of the most biologically diverse areas on Earth. As a nation, Peru has the largest number of bird species in the world and the third largest number of mammals; 44 percent of birds and 63 percent of the mammals inhabit the Peruvian Amazon. Peru also has a very high number of species of butterflies, orchids, and other organisms. Many indigenous people, such as those of the Aguaruna, Cocama-Cocamilla and the Urarina peoples, inhabit the jungle". (Wikipedia)


Bubba Boutique sources a beautiful range of toys, decorations and educational resources that give children the opportunity to experience different material properties and textures to engage their senses and help them discover new abilities.

Measuring 1m x 1m this is truly a feature for any child's room, or use as a backdrop for display with other sea animals (eg. Bubba Boutique's patterned fish, felt fish or marine life set of starfish, coral, shells, fish & seahorse).

This arpillera can be used to discuss sea creatures and engage children to learn about life under the sea. An excellent piece to develop language skills. Beautifully hand made, this arpillera can be explored through touch due to the different materials, fabrics and textures.

name: Caterpillar with numbers
description:
Sourced through Fair Trade (Barbara Sansoni).

Colourful and cute caterpillar with numbers from 1-10. Each number can be threaded on and off to help your child learn to count in a fun and interactive way.

Barbara Sansoni’s handmade toys are lovingly created to the highest quality workmanship. They are visually stimulating for children because of their bright colours and tactile because of their creative use of fabric textures. The toys are made from 100% cotton filled with kapok.
